title: Twitter reached $7 million settlement with whistle-blower.
description: Lawyers for Elon Musk mentioned a $7 million payment to Peiter Zatko, Twitter’s former top security executive, in a court hearing this week.

title: Mercedes and Rivian Plan to Make Vans Together in Europe
description: The agreement is a rare example of cooperation between a traditional carmaker and an upstart.

title: A Goodbye to Readers and a Reflection
description: In Shira Ovide’s last On Tech newsletter, she looks back at how the past two and a half years have shifted her thinking on technology.

title: David Shor, a Data Guru for Democrats, Throws One Last Bash
description: Political operatives, techies and the nightlife crowd mix at a Burning Man-style party hosted by an influential strategist who gained new friends and enemies after a tweet.

title: Investors Sue Treasury Department for Blacklisting a Crypto Platform
description: Tornado Cash was banned last month to prevent hacking, money-laundering and other cryptocurrency crimes.

title: When Teens Find Misinformation, These Teachers Are Ready
description: Media literacy efforts are intensifying, targeting students as they approach voting age. But some educators struggle “to push through that apathy.”

title: A Smartphone That Lasts a Decade? Yes, It’s Possible.
description: A smartphone that is made for longevity can be a real thing. Too bad that’s not how most of them are designed.
